## Source: ossf-package-analysis (75f0747e74a5e0a7d519918b8aceef9e8f4f9eaa0ad1854c1954276bb1c5166c)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'atg-superagent-retry-delay' @ 100.100.100 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
